comments:
Description:
There is a column named "Date" which is string type. Add a computed column named "date", and set its expression "new Date(row["Date"])". Pull the dataset to the layout, add a group on the table, group on "date", set interval as "Year", range is "1". When preview in designer, error occurs.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Get the attached design file.
2.See the dataset column definiton, and table group.
3.Preview in designer, error occurs.
